name: sophist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who uses sophistry (= clever but untrue arguments) in order to deceive people: It was basically a selfish act, though no doubt a sophist would argue that it was done for the general good. She is a sophist who tries to make confused thinking look like common sense. See
sophistry
More examplesFewer examplesFor many years he was a highly paid sophist for the energy industry.His argument is one that would delight a sophist. He was regarded as a vain sophist.
